Module com.example.battleship
Package com.example.battleship.Model.Game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.example.battleship.Model.Game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGame
public class Game extends Object implements IGame
Main controller of the Battleship game.

This class manages players, turn order, boards, ship placement, shooting logic, AI interaction, and overall game state.

It implements IGame and encapsulates the full gameplay lifecycle: setup, playing phase, and game termination.

      Specified by:
      playTurn in interface IGame
      Parameters:

      player - the player performing the shot

      col - target column
